headline: Goldman Sachs sees M&A growth driven by industry consolidation, its president says
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Goldman Sachs' outlook for mergers and acquisitions has become more optimistic, fueled by consolidation in various industry sectors and likely acceleration in private equity-backed deals, its President John Waldron said on Thursday.  "We're getting to a place where that cylinder is going to start firing at a higher level," he said.

headline: Union Pacific Corporation Announces Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date
summary: OMAHA, Neb., September 25, 2025--Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) will release third quarter 2025 financial and operating results on Thursday, October 23, 2025, at 7:45 a.m. ET. The company’s management team will host a conference call and live webcast at 8:45 a.m. ET.
